name: Gone Fishing (Raycast Games)
description:
Welcome to GONE FISHING, a short PSX style game where you play as a detective out on a mission to find 2 teens who were supposedly captured by the Transitus cult.

Use your fishing rod to pick up evidence, and uncover secrets along the way...

This game was made in less than 2 weeks and was inspired by one of Vinny Vinesauce's corruption streams. (The wii sports one)

HAPPY HALLOWEEN!

  • Made by Plazmin: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1uf7oATEEcCN8qa4An-9BQ
  • Music by z3r0: https://www.youtube.com/user/dibbella
